The Scrum Master is responsible for promoting and supporting Scrum as defined in the Scrum Guide. Scrum Masters do this by helping everyone understand
Scrum theory, practices, rules, and values.
questions.question_text:
The Development Team has suggested to move the Daily Scrum to every other day instead of every day.
What is the most appropriate action for the Scrum Master to take?

choices.A: Impediments are raised and resolved more slowly.
choices.C: Less information about the progress will be shared causing the Sprint plan to become inaccurate and reducing transparency over progress toward the Sprint Goal.
choices.D: The Scrum Master loses the ability to update the burndown chart adequately.
choices.E: The Product Owner cannot accurately inspect utilization of the individual team members.
choices.B: Opportunities to inspect and adapt the Sprint Backlog are reduced.

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: ABC
A B C are correct
A, B and C are correct.

questions.answer_description:
The Daily Scrum is an internal meeting for the Development Team to inspect progress toward the Sprint Goal and to inspect how progress is trending toward completing the work in the Sprint Backlog. The Daily Scrum optimizes the probability that the Development Team will meet the Sprint Goal. Every day, the
Development Team should understand how it intends to work together as a self-organizing team to accomplish the Sprint Goal and create the anticipated
Increment by the end of the Sprint.
Reducing the frequency of the event will increase the length of the feedback loop and adds risk if the team deviates too far off course.
questions.question_text:
A Development Team has a total of six members, 4 members who work full time in the office and 2 members who work part time at home. The Development Team is complaining that it is too difficult to synchronize every day and has suggested having the Daily Scrum every other day instead.
What would be three key concerns if the Daily Scrum is held less frequently? (Choose three.)

choices.B: Teach the Product Owner to talk in terms of technology and technical requirements.
choices.D: Translate the technologies used by the Development Team in order for the Product Owner to make decisions.
choices.A: Ensure all communication goes through the Scrum Master first.
choices.C: Observe the communications between them and facilitate discussions if needed or by request.

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: C
C. Observar as comunicações entre eles e facilitar as discussões, se necessário ou mediante solicitação.

O Scrum Master deve atuar como facilitador para garantir uma comunicação eficaz entre a Equipe de Desenvolvimento e o Dono do Produto. Isso envolve observar as interações, estar atento a possíveis obstáculos de comunicação e intervir quando necessário para facilitar discussões e garantir que ambas as partes se compreendam. Agir como intermediário direto ou tradutor pode não ser a melhor abordagem, pois pode criar dependência do Scrum Master para a comunicação, o que não é o ideal no Scrum. O objetivo é promover uma comunicação direta e eficaz entre os membros da equipe.
